about_the_game: The player needs to find an image that is the same shape as the black image at the bottom of the image and place it on top of the black image at the bottom.When you find all the pictures, you can unlock this DLC animations .This DLC contains animations for 6 girls. After completing a task, you can activate an animation. Dlc contains adult nudity.

The game contains some pornography, 
all characters are over 18 years old

detailed_description: The player needs to find an image that is the same shape as the black image at the bottom of the image and place it on top of the black image at the bottom.When you find all the pictures, you can unlock this DLC animations .This DLC contains animations for 6 girls. After completing a task, you can activate an animation. Dlc contains adult nudity.
